name: Butter Bot!
description:
Please use VR headset. Compatible with HTC Vive and Valve's Index headset. 

Game based on VR Game Jam. See video teaser below!


Sarah Richmond (final(Sarah)) - Programmer, Designer

Jordan Bejar (Regretful123) - Programmer, Level Design

Jamail Chachere (TonalRumblePak) - Music, Sound Effects

Li Baun (Wander) - Design, Art

Robot adapted from Francis Valadj's open source design

https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/robot-04-cockpit-3ds-free/809863

Various open source sounds and 3D models used from soundbible/turbo squid. Jamail made 90% of the sounds though.
